scope: Phase-2C: All 8 execution packets + foundation artifacts

G1_fmt_lint.evidence: cargo fmt --check: clean (FrankenJAX crates). cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets: 0 errors, 0 warnings in project crates.

G2_unit_property_tests.evidence: 724 tests across 39 binaries, 0 failed, 0 ignored. Includes 11+ proptest suites (fj-lax, fj-ffi, fj-dispatch, fj-core).

G3_differential_conformance.evidence: Oracle suites: ir_core_oracle(23), pe_staging_oracle(20), api_transforms_oracle(17), dispatch_ad_oracle(16), cache_keying_oracle(15), backend_bridge_oracle(15), ffi_oracle(15), lax_oracle(50). Total: 171 oracle/metamorphic/adversarial tests.

G4_adversarial_crash_regression.evidence: 0 open P0 crashes. Adversarial tests embedded in oracle suites (incompatible shapes, arity violations, unsupported ops, concurrent access). failure_forensics(5) tests verify structured error reporting.

G5_e2e_scenarios.evidence: E2E suites: e2e_p2c001(8), e2e_p2c002(6), e2e_p2c003(6), e2e_p2c004(6), e2e_p2c005(6), e2e_p2c006(6), e2e_p2c007(6), e2e_p2c008(10). Golden journeys: 8. Total: 62 E2E + 8 golden = 70 scenario tests.

G6_performance_regression.evidence: Per-packet baselines established: ir_core, api_front_door, partial_eval, dispatch_ad, cache_keying, backend_bridge, ffi_call_interface, lax_primitives. All dispatch overhead targets met (<50ns).

G7_artifact_schema_validation.evidence: artifact_schemas(2) tests. All evidence_manifest.json files follow frankenjax.evidence-manifest.v1 schema. 8 packets with 10 parity gates each.

G8_durability_decode_proof.evidence: RaptorQ sidecars generated for all 8 packets (16 total). Batch verify: 6/6 passed in artifacts/durability. P2C-008 conformance scrub: SHA256 match=true. Known: upstream RaptorQ small-file decode bug affects scrub/proof for early packets (bd-3dl.9 residual).

safety_profile.unsafe_code_audit: fj-lax: #![forbid(unsafe_code)]. fj-ffi/call.rs: 1 unsafe block with SAFETY comment (FFI boundary). All other crates: no unsafe.

known_issues.description: Upstream RaptorQ small-file decode bug affects scrub/decode-proof for some early packet sidecars (bd-3dl.9 residual). Generate works; scrub may fail on files < ~4KB.
known_issues.mitigation: Sidecar generation succeeds; SHA256 integrity verified via direct comparison. Decode proof deferred to upstream fix.

known_issues.description: LAX round(2.5) returns 3 (Rust half-away-from-zero) vs JAX banker's rounding returning 2.
known_issues.mitigation: Documented in risk_note.md and security_threat_matrix.md. Low impact for ML workloads.

known_issues.description: LAX Gather/Scatter primitives return Unsupported error. Programs using these will fail.
known_issues.mitigation: Documented. Will be addressed in future LAX expansion packet.

known_issues.description: broadcast_in_dim: scalar-tensor only, no full NumPy rank-expanding broadcasting.
known_issues.mitigation: Documented. Tensor-tensor ops require exact shape match.

known_issues.description: Complex dtypes (complex64/complex128) not supported in any subsystem.
known_issues.mitigation: Documented across relevant packets. F64/I64/Bool coverage is complete.

known_issues.description: No dynamic library loading for FFI (V1 static linking only).
GPU/TPU backends not implemented (CPU-only for V1).
known_issues.mitigation: Documented in FJ-P2C-006. Backend bridge routes all to CPU.

recommendation: Phase-2C is ready for sign-off. All 8 packets closed with evidence packs. 724 tests green. 8 CI gates pass (G8 partial due to upstream RaptorQ bug). Known issues are documented with mitigations. No blocking issues remain for V1 scope.
